name: Department of Police Accountability
description: The Department of Police Accountability investigates complaints about police officers and recommend policy changes. Complainants can choose the law enforcement department they want to file a complaint against.
fullDescription: The Department of Police Accountability investigates complaints about police officers and recommend policy changes. Complainants can choose the law enforcement department they want to file a complaint against.
whatTheyOffer: The Department of Police Accountability investigates complaints about police officers and recommend policy changes. Complainants can choose the law enforcement department they want to file a complaint against.
address: 1 South Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA, 94103
